website_summaries.verdict: An affordable, comprehensive set that's available for kids of various ages as well as left and right handed youth golfers.
pros: Both left- and right-handed options available, as well as clubs for different ages
Clubs are high-lofted so they are great for novices
Includes a driver, hybrid wood, a putter, two irons and a bag
cons: Some durability concerns that include broken clubs after use reported

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: The clubs look nice, but are not built well. After my 9 yo son hit about 35 balls the driver was split (see pic) and completely trashed. It's very disappointing because he was really excited to get the clubs for Christmas. Now he doesn't have a driver to use.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Clubs were just too big
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in December for Christmas for my daughter who is 5. She is about 42 inches tall. When we received the clubs they look like they were very big. I purchased the one for kids 3-5 but looks like it’s more suitable for 9-12 year olds. Not sure if I was sent the wrong clubs. I wish they would put the length of the clubs in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Zpatel08

customer_reviews.title: A few months in and clubs are coming undone
customer_reviews.text: After roughly six months of my son playing with the clubs the head as started to detach on the pitching wedge. Didn’t expect these clubs to last years but figured we’d get one year out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Specialkay

customer_reviews.title: Not just a cheap set these clubs perform!
customer_reviews.text: Both of my kids 8 and 10 have a set and they are actually decent clubs. My husband and I are both golfers so we considered getting them junior pings or another pricier set but I’m glad we did not because these clubs are working out really well.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Denton

customer_reviews.title: Good but heavy
customer_reviews.text: Kind of cheap feeling, but not bad, that’s why you buy them for casual kids use. Only complaint is the clubs are pretty heavy for kids. They’ll defiantly need to develop some strength to use them properly.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set.
customer_reviews.text: They are a great starter set. A little top heavy when carrying the bag. To counter weight the club head weight I added a bunch of golf balls in the storage pockets. That seemed to do the trick. My 6 year old son hit all the clubs easily. The aren’t too heavy for him.
customer_reviews.author: DAZZ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought for granddaughter’s birthday the clubs and bag seem to be of good quality. If you are wanting a started kit without spending big bucks, these are a good buy. My g.daughter is using them outside and hitting balls into a net. Soon when the courses open up - she will be using them hitting hole in ones!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Best Set for Ages 3-5!
customer_reviews.text: These clubs are perfect for beginners! They have perfect swing weight, look nice, and comes with a quality adjustable strap stand bag. I looked and looked for my 3.5 year old son and finally asked a friend from the golf course and he said his 3 year old loves this set... They'll likely be used until age 5 and handed down to my younger daughter at that age. Estimated 3 years out of these since kids grow so fast!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grandson really likes his “real” clubs!
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson was so excited to receive “real” golf clubs on his 5th birthday. He’s had a great time learning the game along side his Pop & his Dad. Many left-handed clubs we looked at were very expensive, but this set is economical & just looks expensive.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great kids learning clubs
customer_reviews.text: Great golf clubs for my 7 year old grandson, just what I was looking for. Nice quality for the price, even the bag is very nice. He loves them! Recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Southern New Hampshire resident

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got these for her 4th birthday. They are a little big for her now but she’s already hitting balls about 50-60 yds after 2 months of owning these. It’s a great starter set that she will be able to use for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Good for the beginning golfer
customer_reviews.text: This set of clubs is really cute and well made for the beginning golfer. They came in left handed ( they are out of right) so I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: B. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality - had to return.
customer_reviews.text: Quite poorly made clubs, at least for 11 yo. May be OK for toddlers. After some play the driver plate caved in crimping the upper plate. Manufacturer and protection plan refused to cover / repair. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Roman P.

customer_reviews.title: Our son really loves going to the driving range with me now
customer_reviews.text: These have been great and have inspired our son to improve at golf. He always wants to go to the driving range now which is the best gift these clubs could have given me!
customer_reviews.author: Scott A Munnecke

customer_reviews.title: 3 year old imagination are great.
customer_reviews.text: 3-year old birthday gift. She loved it, but they make great swords, too. 😂😂😂. She will start taking lessons soon. Loved that they came for my leftie granddaughter!
customer_reviews.author: Luan

customer_reviews.title: Great set of youth girl's golf clubs
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice set of girl's golf clubs with a very nice bag. Great value for the money and I'm sure they will last until she moves up to the next size. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: coloradddo

customer_reviews.title: Grandson was SO excited....
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old grandson received these for his birthday and he actually slept with them night 1! He loves them and plays with them after school every day....
customer_reviews.author: Jbaker

customer_reviews.title: Good starter set
customer_reviews.text: A good starter set for any young girl. The clubs are durable enough to withstand the beating it takes from my little girl. The bag is sectioned off so each club has it's own spot, and it has backpack straps for carrying. It has plenty of pocket space to put accessories in. Overall it is a good value and my kid loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Casey E.

customer_reviews.title: Exciting Times!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely manner in excellent condition. We bought a lefty and a righty. Grandkids are a mix of both. We shall see what they are most comfortable with! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect golf clubs for our LO!
customer_reviews.text: Really great golf set for our LO! It is the perfect size and comes with 4 different clubs. Also, the color is very cute!
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SET OF CLUBS
customer_reviews.text: THIS SET OF CLUBS IS GREAT, MY 6 YEAR OLD LOVES THEM. HER ONLY COMPLAINT IS THAT THE DRIVER IS A LITTLE ON THE HEAVY SIDE. I COULDNT BELIEVE HOW NICE AND SOLID THESE CLUBS ARE.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Baker

customer_reviews.title: She loves them
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Six-year-old daughter they may be the only year she gets to use them and will grow out of them but worth the price and them fitting right for her to have fun
customer_reviews.author: Krazy kitty reviews

customer_reviews.title: Nice beginner golf set
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner set for kids trying out golf. Bag and clubs look nice, and the clubs feel and hit nicely.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Jr Set..
customer_reviews.text: Very eye appealing for my granddaughter and the she immediately started hitting them well...; time will tell for endurance..

customer_reviews.title: Good Set
customer_reviews.text: Bought for five year old. He loves it. Product as advertised and arrived quickly.

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old approved
customer_reviews.text: Our 5 year old son just started showing an interest in golf. These are great for him! We took him to the golf course and he loved using them!
customer_reviews.author: Linsey Nagorski

customer_reviews.title: This is a great set for my younger son
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set for my younger son, he loves it & can't wait til we can go to the driving range together. Clubs & bag are of good quality, not as an adult set but will take the abuse of a 6 year old.
customer_reviews.author: joshua monroe

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and cool
customer_reviews.text: Came just as described. My nephew loves them and I'm looking forward to him using them. Real clubs, not cheap plastic or garbage material. Really well made.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. It's for my grandson. But he wont be trying it out until December. It's a birthday gift. But I'm impressed with the quality.

customer_reviews.title: Bag came ripped
customer_reviews.text: Love the clubs but the "club cover" came with a hole in it. Thought about returning but hopefully they will just replace the cover.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good shape. My 9 year old granddaughter loves them
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves these. Now he is able to golf with his dad or grandparents.

customer_reviews.title: Please open my window so I can get a bigger size in clubs.
customer_reviews.text: Because of the pandemic my granddaughter has not been able to use your clubs yet. Also she has grown 2 inches since June. I would like to exchange her clubs for a size up. The ones I bought from you have not been used and are too short for her. Will your company open my return window so I can exchange the clubs for the 6 to 8. djbray44@gmail.com.
customer_reviews.author: Darla J Bray

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and weight for my 4 year old. She loves carrying her bag around! They are not cheaply made toy clubs, but actual clubs that can take a beating. Well worth the money!

customer_reviews.title: Great set of clubs for a kid
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old loves these. They are the perfect size!

customer_reviews.title: My eight-year-old loves them. Perfect little starter set for kids. Good bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: My eight-year-old loves them. Perfect little starter set for kids. Good bang for the buck

customer_reviews.title: A good car
customer_reviews.text: It's a great stroller;I feel safe every time I push out the door;Because the quality of the car is so good;It's also convenient to take the kids with you when you're out;It's fantastic;Once When I went out to play, it was very inconvenient to hold the baby;With this car I can go there just as easily;It's fantastic

customer_reviews.title: item came damaged
customer_reviews.text: the clubs are very nice but the case came completely ripped. it's very frustrating because it's such a bulky, heavy item. difficult to return, yet it would be nice to just get a replacement cover instead of sending back the heavy clubs.

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my seven year old. Clubs look great. They’re a little long for him (mainly the driver) but otherwise great set.

customer_reviews.title: They are so cute but have great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my grandson. He loves them. They are so cute but have great quality.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my grand child. Initially I got left handed set but needed right handed. Amazon promptly sent a return label and replaced it with a right handed golf club set. My grand child is thrilled with it. We all are happy.

customer_reviews.title: Good but heavy
customer_reviews.text: Seem like good clubs but really heavy for kids clubs. The putter is as heavy or heavier than my taylormade mini spider with a 15g weight in it.

customer_reviews.title: Boys Golf Clubs and Bag

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t ask for more!
customer_reviews.text: Best clubs for my leftie daughter. Far better than what I grew up with...times 10. Great clubs an amazing putter.

customer_reviews.title: where is refund
customer_reviews.text: great product but ordered wrong hand by mistake returned item june 19th and have not seen a refund and it July 2nd Not sure what problem is, it has been saying on its way since June 23rd???? 🤷‍♀️🤷‍♀️🤷‍♀️ I have never had any issues with returns and refunds

customer_reviews.title: Well built, and the weight of the club shows it...
customer_reviews.text: These clubs and bag are both built well. I’m only giving 3 stars because they are pretty heavy. All in all these will last and are a good set to for introduction to golf.

customer_reviews.text: Grand kids are having fun and enjoying their golf game!

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and these clubs are legit.

customer_reviews.title: great for my 6 year old!
customer_reviews.text: good quality, light weight, nice bag, perfect for my 50" tall 6 year old to use now and over the next couple years.

customer_reviews.title: To long
customer_reviews.text: These clubs claim 3’8” - 4’4”. My daughter is 3’10” and they are way to long. I think the might be to long for 4’4”. My advice is to get US Kids clubs. Pay the extra. Because now I have paid for these and US Kids.

product_meta.title: PreciseGolf Co. Precise X7 Junior Complete Golf Club Set for Children Kids - 3 Age Groups Boys & Girls - Right Hand & Left Hand!
product_meta.description: A positive first experience for young golfers is crucial to their future enjoyment of the game. Get your little golfer started right by ensuring they're using equipment properly designed for their strength, size, and ability. Designed specifically for junior golfers, this Precise X7 junior set applies proven technology to a pre-packaged set of clubs that are lightweight, forgiving, and easy to hit. The result: high-launching, longer-carrying, fun-inspiring shots for your young golfer.
feature_bullets: HIGH-LOFTED CLUBS ARE EASIER TO HIT!
ULTRALITE JUNIOR FLEX GRAPHITE SHAFTS ON ALL CLUBS!
LIGHTWEIGHT JUNIOR GOLF BAG WITH STAND!
DUAL STRAPS FOR BAG ALLOWS IT TO BE CARRIED LIKE A BACKPACK!
